alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 1:09PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade County through 145 PM EDT... At 109 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Doral, or 7 miles southwest of Hialeah, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Miramar, Doral, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Opa-Locka, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, Medley, Westchester, Fountainbleau, Westview, Pennsuco, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, Tamiami, University Park, Miami International Airport, Palm Springs North, Olympia Heights and Sunset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
